msbt.message: It's over between me and , .We made some good memories, didn't we? But the bright lights of another island are calling me I suppose I'll spend the day reminiscing over a hot mug of
Oh, sorry. I'm just trying to commit as much of to memory as I can. Yep, I'll think back fondly on the place where it all started for me
Well, it's almost time to say goodbye to .When I think of this place, I'll think of and Perhaps not the greatest combo. But then again, that's part of why I'm moving.
